basics.name: CChHecEkF
basics.label: Chef
basics.summary: Passionate Chef with broad background in various culinary styles and positions. A natural leader with excellent interpersonal communication skills and the ability to get things done overcoming any obstacles.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: All aspects of an independently operated Hospital kitchen including staffing, payroll, menus, inventory/ordering, P&L, employee training and discipline, cleaning and equipment maintenance.
highlights: Reduced food costs by expertly estimating purchasing needs and buying through approved suppliers.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitor sanitation practices to ensure that employees follow standards and regulations. Preparing specialized menus for children with dietary needs and requirements. Direct activities of one or more workers who assist in preparing and serving meals.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitor compliance with health and fire regulations regarding food preparation and serving, and building maintenance in lodging and dining facilities. Count money and make bank deposits.
highlights: Recruit and hire staff, such as cooks and other kitchen workers.
